remarks: Cancellation law for scalar multiplication.  ( ~ hvmulcan2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2014.)
statement:
lvecmulcan2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lvecmulcan2.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
lvecmulcan2.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lvecmulcan2.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lvecmulcan2.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lvecmulcan2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lvecmulcan2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. K ) $.
lvecmulcan2.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. K ) $.
lvecmulcan2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lvecmulcan2.n $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .0. ) $.
lvecvscan2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A .x. X ) = ( B .x. X ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
